title: Resume
text:
Here is a summary of my education, professional experience, and skills.
You can also download my full PDF resume below.

Master of Business Administration (MBA) ‚Äì Finance
University Canada West, Vancouver (2024 ‚Äì Present)
Bachelor of Commerce ‚Äì Finance & Management
Hemwati Nandan Bahuguna Garhwal University, India (2015 ‚Äì 2018)








Managed client portfolios, answered queries, and sold Rogers products.

Conducted cold calling and direct interactions with customers.

Provided training to new hires.





Served 100+ clients daily with tailored financial solutions.

Leveraged CRM software to streamline client follow-ups, improving satisfaction.

Transitioned from teller role to welcome desk, pitching third-party products.

Resolved client grievances and product/service-related queries.





Responded to consumer inquiries and maintained client relationships.

Oversaw loan processing, branch cash management, and reconciliation statements.

Ensured customers were informed of new financial products.





Managed daily branch operations and reconciliations.

Sold third-party financial products (health insurance, home insurance).

Supported customers with account and financial service queries.







Oversaw 200+ client accounts, achieving 15% higher retention in the first year.

Implemented a new CRM system, improving response times by 20% and satisfaction by 25%.

Led a financial literacy program, increasing new account openings by 10% in six months.






Customer Service | Financial Management | CRM Software

Communication | Problem-Solving | Account Management | Attention to Detail






Office 365 (Word, Excel, PowerPoint)

Tally ERP9

CRM Tools

title: Projects
text:
A selection of my work showcasing leadership, problem-solving, and financial expertise.



Implemented a new CRM system at HDFC Bank.

Improved customer response times by 20%.

Increased customer satisfaction scores by 25%.





Led a cross-functional team to design and launch a literacy program.

Boosted client engagement.

Resulted in 10% more new account openings in 6 months.

Achieved this through individualized care and proactive communication.
